translations: v.使从属于，使处于次要地位；使隶属，使服从

sentences.sentence: In many societies women are subordinate to men.
sentences.translation: 在许多社会中，妇女都从属于男人。

sentences.sentence: Sixty of his subordinate officers followed his example.
sentences.translation: 他的60个下级官员都以他为榜样。

sentences.sentence: He was both willing and able to subordinate all else to this aim.
sentences.translation: 他既愿意也能够让别的一切从属于这个目标。
